com.cubeia.firebase.api.syslog
Interface SystemLog

public interface SystemLog

Firebase system log access interface. The system log is responsible for high level messages only and should not be used for ordinary logging.

The log contains a buffer of messages kept in memory, when this buffer is exceeded old events will be dropped. Normally the system log is also written to file and old dropped events can be retrieved from the file system.

Author:
lars.j.nilsson
